TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit DomainUpDown/DomainUpDownItemCollection extends System.Collections.ArrayList

summary.span: 封装一个对象集合供 类使用。

span.span: Encapsulates a collection of objects for use by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要创建要在中显示的对象集合控件，你可以添加或删除项单独使用和方法。To create a collection of objects to display in the control, you can add or remove the items individually by using the and methods. 从父控件中，访问集合，也可由属性。The collection is accessed from the parent control, , by the property. ## Examples 下面的示例创建并初始化控件。The following example creates and initializes a control. 该示例可以设置其属性的部分，并在 up-down 控件创建显示的字符串集合。The example allows you to set some of its properties and create a collection of strings for display in the up-down control. 代码假定，和已实例化窗体上。The code assumes that a , and a have been instantiated on a form. 该示例还假定你已在类级别声明作为名为 32 位有符号整数的一个成员变量`myCounter`。The example also assumes that you have a member variable at the class level declared as a 32-bit signed integer named `myCounter`. 你可以在文本框中输入字符串并将其添加到集合时单击该按钮。You can enter a string in the text box and add it to the collection when the button is clicked. 通过单击复选框，您可以切换属性和观察 up-down 控件中的项集合中的差异。By clicking the check box, you can toggle the property and observe the difference in the collection of items in the up-down control. [!code-cpp[Classic DomainUpDown.DomainUpDownItemCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown.DomainUpDownItemCollection Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DomainUpDown.DomainUpDownItemCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown.DomainUpDownItemCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DomainUpDown.DomainUpDownItemCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown.DomainUpDownItemCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你还可以添加一个新到通过使用集合方法。You can also add a new to the collection by using the method. 若要删除您之前添加，请使用或方法。To remove an that you have previously added, use the or methods. ## Examples 下面的示例创建并初始化控件。The following example creates and initializes a control. 该示例可以设置其属性的部分，并在 up-down 控件创建显示的字符串集合。The example allows you to set some of its properties and create a collection of strings for display in the up-down control. 代码假定，和已实例化窗体上。The code assumes that a , and a have been instantiated on a form. 该示例还假定你已在类级别声明作为名为 32 位有符号整数的一个成员变量`myCounter`。The example also assumes that you have a member variable at the class level declared as a 32-bit signed integer named `myCounter`. 你可以在文本框中输入字符串并将其添加到集合时单击该按钮。You can enter a string in the text box and add it to the collection when the button is clicked. 通过单击复选框，您可以切换属性和观察 up-down 控件中的项集合中的差异。By clicking the check box, you can toggle the property and observe the difference in the collection of items in the up-down control.
